## ğŸ“¦ å®‰è£…

```bash
npm install sensd --save
```

```bash
yarn add sensd
```

## ğŸ”¨ ç¤ºä¾‹

```jsx
import { Button, DatePicker } from 'sensd';

const App = () => (
  <>
    <Button type="primary">PRESS ME</Button>
    <DatePicker />
  </>
);
```

å¼•å…¥æ ·å¼ï¼š

```jsx
import 'sensd/dist/sensd.css'; // or 'sensd/dist/sensd.less'
```

## âŒ¨ï¸ æœ¬åœ°å¼€å‘

```bash
$ git clone git@gitlab.sensorsdata.cn:sens-design/sensd.git
$ cd sensd
$ npm install
$ npm start
```
